com.staples.puzzle.processor

Class StaplesAnalyticsProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.staples.puzzle.processor.StaplesAnalyticsProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IStaplesAnalyticsProcessor

    public class StaplesAnalyticsProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
implements IStaplesAnalyticsProcessor
    Main singleton processor class for Staples Analytics Application This processor class contains method for generating the analytics report based on the requested sort order.
    Author:
    KANPR001

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StaplesReportBean getAnalyticsReport(java.lang.String reportType)
      This method generates the final analytics report based on the reportType requested in the input a) Retrieve Staples and Merchant Order data as OrderDataBean b) Merge the OrderDataBeans to form the OrderBean c) Push all the OrderBeans into an ArrayList d) Sort the OrderBeans based on the requested reportType (1) session-type-desc - sort by session_type descending (2) order-id-asc - sort by order_id ascending (3) unit-price-dollars-asc - sort by unit_price_dollars ascending e) Meanwhile calculate Staples and Merchant SummaryDataBean f) Create an instance of StaplesReportBean with summary and details of all Staples and Merchant Orders
      static StaplesAnalyticsProcessor getInstance()
      Public exposed method to either retrieve StaplesAnalyticsProcessor instance if already present or create a new one.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static StaplesAnalyticsProcessor getInstance()
        Public exposed method to either retrieve StaplesAnalyticsProcessor instance if already present or create a new one.
        Returns:
        processor_instance - instance of the StaplesAnalyticsProcessor

      • getAnalyticsReport

        public StaplesReportBean getAnalyticsReport(java.lang.String reportType)
        This method generates the final analytics report based on the reportType requested in the input a) Retrieve Staples and Merchant Order data as OrderDataBean b) Merge the OrderDataBeans to form the OrderBean c) Push all the OrderBeans into an ArrayList d) Sort the OrderBeans based on the requested reportType (1) session-type-desc - sort by session_type descending (2) order-id-asc - sort by order_id ascending (3) unit-price-dollars-asc - sort by unit_price_dollars ascending e) Meanwhile calculate Staples and Merchant SummaryDataBean f) Create an instance of StaplesReportBean with summary and details of all Staples and Merchant Orders
        Specified by:
        getAnalyticsReport in interface IStaplesAnalyticsProcessor
        Parameters:
        reportType - - type of report that needs to be generated by this method
        Returns:
        reportBean - final report as instance of StaplesReportBean
